title: The Heavenly Horse from the Outermost West
description: This hard-to-find, much beloved classic is now available in ebook form. Like WATERSHIP DOWN, this beast fable has thousands of dedicated readers, young and old. The Dark Horse and his demon army search for the last true Appaloosa, while, from the Courts of the Outermost West, the Dancer enters the world to save his breed from extinction.
author: Mary Stanton
